h2_title: Where to Find The Old Ginseng Guai
h3_title: Old Ginseng Guai Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: He can perform a variety of lurching stomp attacks, many of which will create a small area of poisonous roots. Like the ice frog, you'll want to take back control of the battlefield by reorienting yourself, and use the Thrust Stance to hit him with charged strikes while staying out of the poison.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Ginseng_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Old Ginseng Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find The Old Ginseng Guai' and the sub-subsection 'Old Ginseng Guai Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can perform a variety of lurching stomp attacks, many of which will create a small area of poisonous roots. Like the ice frog, you'll want to take back control of the battlefield by reorienting yourself, and use the Thrust Stance to hit him with charged strikes while staying out of the poison.
